resources.string: Error!
Authentication failed! Please enter valid id and password.
Access to data failed! You may not have sufficient rights
Could not connect to Server! Please check your connection settings or contact Admin
Data or value(s) did not match!
Error in deleting data. Some other data may be dependent on the item you want to delete
Duplication error! Another copy of the same data or Patient ID already exists
Empty data! Please fill in the required field(s)
At least one option must be selected form the list
This Form/Report is not available right now
Error in inserting data. Please make sure you are not violating validation rules
Incomplete operation error! Patient created but encounter and observations were not saved
No data was found matching the criteria
Invalid value(s)! Please make sure your input is in correct format
Date or Time is invalid. Make sure you have entered appropriate date/time
Operation cancelled
Value out of range!
One or more Parameters are invalid or missing. Please make sure you have defined valid parameters
Data cannot be parsed. Please make sure data is in valid format
Session expired! Please re-login to continue operation
Unknown error! Please check error log for details
Error in updating data. Please make sure you are not violating validation rules
User not found! Please enter correct user name
Missing or Invalid Provider. Please contact Administrator.
Missing Barcode Scanner. Please download and install Barcode Scanner from Play Store to be able to scan the QR Codes.
No option selected. Select one to continue.
No Location selected. Select one to continue.
Option not available in offline mode. Please sign-in and try again.
